name: Twitter (Old) - No Bulletin
description:
This one nixes the yellow bulletin (e.g., "upgrade Firefox") which, if you don't obey it, will pop up every time you log in.

*Update 7/12/09: I've changed the style to affect all of Twitter, not just the first page, for better compatibility with Decklin Foster's "Twitter Page by ID" userscript. (Find it here: http://bit.ly/TwitID)
